ComicInfo.Penciller: Bill Messner-Loebs,Don Simpson,Joe Orlando,William Messner-Loebs,John Peck,William Messner-Loebs,John Peck,Don Simpson,Joe Orlando
ComicInfo.Summary:
Three more stories from the fringes of Wasteland. In “After the Dead Detective,” drawn by Flash writer William Messner-Loebs, Croak McGraw hits the streets-the hard-boiled corpse redux. It’s life in the fast-food lane with “Titty-Tat Breath,” drawn by The Phantom artist Joe Orlando. And just how offensive could a story called “Misogynist Funnies” be? Artist Donald Simpson refuses to talk. You’ll just have to wait and see. All stories written by John Ostrander and Del Close.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/wasteland-12-after-the-dead-detective-passing-grad/4000-47663/
ComicInfo.Title: After the Dead Detective; Passing Grade; Titty-Tat Breath
